下班以后我就回家休息。: 我们先去旅馆，再去吃饭。
Wǒmen xiān qù lǚguǎn, zài qù chīfàn.
We’ll go to the hotel first, then go eat.

Zhè jiā fàndiàn de cài hěn hǎochī.
The food at this restaurant is very tasty.

下班以后我就回家休息。: 饭馆里人很多，我们等一会儿吧。
Fànguǎn lǐ rén hěn duō, wǒmen děng yíhuìr ba.
There are lots of people in the restaurant; let’s wait a bit.

Wǒmen zài cháguǎn hē chá liáotiān.
We drink tea and chat in the teahouse.

Wǒ chángcháng zài kāfēiguǎn kàn shū.
I often read in a café.

下班以后我就回家休息。: 这家店不大，但是东西很多。
Zhè jiā diàn bù dà, dànshì dōngxi hěn duō.
This shop isn’t big, but it has lots of things.

下班以后我就回家休息。: 这个馆里很安静，可以看书。
Zhè gè guǎn lǐ hěn ānjìng, kěyǐ kàn shū.
It’s quiet in this place; you can read here.

Wǒ zài gōngsī shàngbān dào wǔ diǎn.
I work at the company until five o’clock.

Tā shēngbìng le, suǒyǐ qù yīyuàn.
He got sick, so he went to the hospital.

Wǒ zài chúfáng bāng māma zuò fàn.
I help my mom cook in the kitchen.
